cards.name: Debrii
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a <mark>Rock</mark> to each other location.

cards.name: Fan Fei
cards.ability: Activate: Your other cards here get +1 Power. Move them to the right.

cards.name: Hydra Stomper
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each time one of your cards moved this game.

cards.name: M'Baku
cards.ability: At the end of the game, this jumps from your deck to your lowest-Power location. (that isn't full)

cards.name: Misery
cards.ability: On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

cards.name: The First Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card from your hand. Remove that card's Power from this.

cards.name: Vision
cards.ability: You can move this each turn.

cards.name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from front-row enemy cards here.

cards.name: Odin
cards.ability: On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here.

cards.name: Orka
cards.ability: Ongoing: +7 Power if this is your only card here.

cards.name: Storm
cards.ability: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

cards.name: Wave
cards.ability: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

cards.name: White Queen
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent's hand into your hand.

cards.name: Sparky
cards.ability: Activate: Give your card that last moved +2 Power and move it back to its previous location.

cards.name: Zombie Galacti
cards.ability: Start of Game: Choose 6 other cards in your deck. On Reveal: Transform those cards into copies of this.

cards.name: Weapon X Wolverine
cards.ability: After one of your other cards is destroyed, +1 Power. After every 3rd time, improve this effect by 1. (0/3)

cards.name: Aurora
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give one of your other On Reveal cards at each location +2 Power. Repeat for Ongoing, Activate, and End of Turn.

items.title: Golden Gauntlet World Finals
items: The best of the best collide! 50 Season Passes will be given away during the live Twitch broadcast! 【Winner: Zapgaze】

items.title: New To Snap Packs
items: Nov 4 - Zombie Scarlet Witch (Seasonal Series 5)

items.title: High Voltage (Weekend Edition)
items: This four-day event will be a purely cosmetic event, with no unlockable cards.

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: This event features exciting new rewards including the brand new Series 4 card, Hydro-Man.

items.title: Featured Sets
items: Nov 5 - Nov 11 - Spider Society Picks
Nov 18 - Nov 24 - Anime Variant Spotlight

items.name: Debrii
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.
3/7 – On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location.

items.name: Misery
changes: 4/9 – On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

items.name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
changes: 5/7 – On Reveal: Remove the text from front-row enemy cards here.

items.name: Vision
changes: 5/8 – You can move this each turn.

items.name: The First Ghost Rider
changes: 2/6 – On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card from your hand. Remove that card’s Power from this.

items.name: M’Baku
changes: 1/2 – At the end of the game, this jumps from your deck to your lowest-Power location. (that isn’t full)

items.name: Fan Fei
changes: 4/7 – Activate: Move your other cards here to the right.
4/7 -> 4/4 – Activate: Your other cards here get +1 Power. Move them to the right.

items.name: Hydra Stomper
changes: 3/2 – Ongoing: +1 Power for each time one of your cards moved this game.

items.name: Sparky
changes: 2/1 – Activate: Give your card that last moved +3 Power and move it back to its previous location.
2/1 -> 2/2 – Activate: Give your card that last moved +2 Power and move it back to its previous location.

items.name: Storm
changes: 3/2 – On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

items.name: Zombie Galacti
changes: 7/4 – Game Start: Choose 6 other cards in your deck. On Reveal: Transform those cards into copies of this

items.name: Orka
changes: 6/11 – Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.
6/11 – Ongoing: +7 Power if this is your only card here.

items.name: Odin
changes: 6/8 – On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here.

items.name: Wave
changes: 3/5 – On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

items.name: White Queen
changes: 3/4 – On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent’s hand into your hand.
